title: Pompeo Discusses Senate Race in Kansas with Koch
text:
Secretary of State Mike Pompeo discussed the U.S. Senate race in Kansas with billionaire Charles Koch and a top official from his namesake company during a visit to Wichita on Friday, according to a person familiar with the meeting.

At the meeting, which included Dave Robertson, president and chief operating officer of Koch Industries, Inc., the three men also discussed the national and international business climate and the current political climate, the person said. “It was friends reconnecting, as well,” the person added.

...
description: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo discussed the U.S. Senate race in Kansas with billionaire Charles Koch and a top official from his namesake company during a visit to Wichita on Friday, according to a person familiar with the meeting.
